jd:
Let’s Make Germany More Welcoming – Together!

  

At Fintiba, we believe that moving to a new country should be exciting – not overwhelming. That’s why we build smart digital solutions that make the lives of international students in Germany easier. We already support people from over 190 countries and continue to grow fast. Now, we’re looking for a creative marketing leader who shares our vision and knows how to turn ideas into campaigns that not only perform but inspire.

  

What’s Your Mission?



You’ll take the lead in shaping and executing our online marketing strategy – with creativity, heart, and a performance\\-driven mindset. You think in stories, funnels, and metrics. Furthermore, you’re just as excited about a strong brand message as you are about an optimized CPC.

  

In your role, you will:


* Lead and mentor a talented in\\-house team of 5 marketing professionals.
* Own and evolve our online marketing strategy across all digital touchpoints.
* Create data\\-driven, targeted campaigns with a bold creative twist.
* Take our SEO and website performance to the next level.
* Manage paid performance channels like SEA, social media ads \\& email (HubSpot/Mailjet).
* Collaborate with design, content and external partners to deliver outstanding campaigns.
* Track, test, analyze – and always look for the next big opportunity.
* Align closely with internal stakeholders (Sales, Product, Customer Support) to bring marketing impact across the entire customer journey.
  


✨ Who You Are



You're a natural storyteller with a passion for results. You love leading creative people, bringing out the best in them – while never losing sight of the bigger picture.

  

You bring:


* 5\\+ years of experience in digital marketing with proven team leadership.
* A strong background in B2C and B2B marketing in an international environment.
* Confidence in working with tools like Google Analytics, Google Ads, Meta Business Manager, HubSpot.
* An analytical mindset and love for numbers, dashboards \\& performance KPIs.
* Excellent communication skills in German and English.
* A passion for cultural diversity, international education and purpose\\-driven work.
  


What’s In It For You?



At Fintiba, you’ll find more than just a job – you’ll find purpose, a talented team, and the freedom to bring your creative vision to life.

  

We offer:


* An international, mission\\-driven team and flat hierarchies.
* A hybrid work setup with up to 40% remote work within Germany.
* 30 days of vacation, plus an annual vacation budget (150 EUR net).
* Monthly mobility allowance (50 EUR net).
* Training budget of 600 EUR net per year – for your growth.
* Workation option: up to 15 working days per year within the EU/EEA.
* Bonus program \\& access to corporate benefits.
* A green courtyard in the heart of Frankfurt – for team BBQs, hangouts, and workshops.
  


Ready to Make an Impact?



If you’re a creative marketer who thrives in a fast\\-moving, international environment – and loves turning strategy into stories and numbers into results – then we want to hear from you.

  

Apply now and help shape the future of global mobility – with Fintiba.

**MARKETING MANAGER (M/W/D)**
=============================

**MARKETING MANAGER (M/W/D)**
-----------------------------

**Eine Raute. Ein Versprechen.** Als Fußballverein haben wir eine über 120\\-jährige Tradition, als Bundesligist mit internationaler Ausstrahlung und großem Bekanntheits\\- und Beliebtheitsgrad stehen wir für ein frisches, ambitioniertes und authentisches Auftreten. Für unsere Fans und unsere Partner schaffen wir Erlebnisse mit großen Emotionen. Leidenschaftliche Fußballentwicklung seit 1900! Unabhängig, unbeugsam, unzähmbar! Mit der Raute im Herzen arbeiten wir Tag für Tag an der Erfüllung dieses Versprechens.  

  

Zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt (Vollzeit, unbefristet)**Deine Aufgaben**
------------------

* Konzeption und Umsetzung von Marketingmaßnahmen
* Erstellung von Kommunikationskonzepten und Mediaplanungen
* Koordination und Planung der Umsetzung von Werbemitteln in Zusammenarbeit mit dem Design\\-Team
* Strategische Planung, Steuerung und Umsetzung von internen und externen Marketingprojekten
* Steuerung von externen Dienstleistern und Partnern in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachabteilungen
* Organisation und Budgetverwaltung von Werbeumsetzungen
**Deine Skills**
----------------

* Abgeschlossene Ausbildung oder abgeschlossenes Studium im Bereich Marketing
* Mind. 2\\-3 Jahre Berufserfahrung, vorzugsweise in einer Agentur
* Praktische Erfahrung im Bereich Performance Marketing und Kampagnenplanung
* Zielgerichtetes Arbeiten unter Berücksichtigung vorgegebener KPI’s
* Strukturierte Arbeitsweise mit hoher Detailgenauigkeit
* Eine schnelle Auffassungsgabe, Sorgfalt, Selbstständigkeit und Eigeninitiative
* Bereitschaft zur Arbeit an Spieltagen
* Sicheres Auftreten und Kommunikationsstärke
* Hands\\-on\\-Mentalität
* Sicherer Umgang mit den gängigen Office\\-Programmen
* Gute Englisch\\-Kenntnisse
**Was wir bieten**
------------------

* Eine interessante, vielseitige Tätigkeit mit persönlichen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten
* Ein familiäres Arbeitsklima in einem dynamischen Umfeld mit motivierten und sympathischen Kollegen
* Ein modernes Arbeitsumfeld mit einer besonderen Stadionatmosphäre
* Ein unbefristetes Arbeitsverhältnis mit geregelten Arbeitszeiten und Homeoffice\\-Möglichkeit
* Bereitstellung von kostenfreien, alkoholfreien Getränken (Mineralwasser/Kaffee), Freikarten für Heimspiele, Vergünstigungen in der Fohlen Sportsbar und Fanshop\\-Rabatte, Jobrad\\-Leasing, Zuschuss DeutschlandTicket Job, Betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement (Zuschuss Medical Park) sowie zahlreiche weitere Corporate Benefits
**WILLKOMMEN IM TEAM!**
-----------------------


Du willst gemeinsam mit uns die Geschichte, auf die wir stolz sind, weiterschreiben? Dann freuen wir uns darauf, Dich kennenzulernen. unter Angabe Deines frühesten Eintrittstermins sowie Deines Gehaltswunsches (Bruttojahresgehalt).

jd:
**Product Owner / Produktmanager Medizintechnik (m/w/d) Schwerpunkt Patient Interfaces**
========================================================================================

* Hamburg
**Warum Löwenstein Medical Technology?**
----------------------------------------


Neue Wege gehen. Aber nie vergessen wo man herkommt. Löwenstein Medical Technology ist ein mittelständisches Unternehmen unter dem Dach der international aufgestellten Löwenstein Gruppe. Als Kompetenzträger für respiratorische Diagnostik und Therapie entwickeln und produzieren wir in Deutschland hochwertige Medizinprodukte „Made in Germany“ für den weltweiten Einsatz in der Schlaf\\- und Beatmungsmedizin. Wir investieren in Mitarbeiter, die unsere zentralen Werte Eigenverantwortung, Begeisterung, Kreativität und Leistung in den Fokus ihres Schaffens stellen.  

  

Wir suchen zum nächstmöglchen Zeitpunkt einen **Product Owner / Produktmanager (m/w/d)** als Unterstützung für den Bereich Patient Interfaces.**Ihr Beitrag**
---------------

* Erfassung, Ausgestaltung und Formulierung von Anforderungen zu relevanten Produkten im medizintechnischen Kontext
* Neuentwicklung und technische Betreuung von Patient Interfaces und ihrer Leistungsmerkmale über den kompletten Produktlebenszyklus
* Lösungsorientierte Bearbeitung komplexer Kundenfragestellungen unter Berücksichtigung wirtschaftlicher Rahmenbedingungen
* Beobachtung der Zielmärkte, Identifikation potenzieller Veränderungen und innovativer Trends
* Eigenverantwortliche Leitung und Umsetzung von Projekten im Rahmen des Product Ownerships
**Das bringen Sie mit**
-----------------------

* Abgeschlossenes Studium im technischen oder naturwissenschaftlichen Bereich bzw. eine vergleichbare Ausbildung (z. B. Medizintechnik, Wirtschafts\\- oder Ingenieurwissenschaften)
* Know\\-how im Rahmen der Medizintechnik, Produktkenntnisse im Bereich Patient Interfaces mit Fokus auf Masken und Schläuche von Vorteil
* Verständnis bzgl. klinischer Anforderungen und regulatorischer Vorgaben
* Strategische Denkweise, hohe Innovationsbereitschaft und technische Affinität
* Hands\\-on\\-Mentalität, Spaß am direkten und indirekten Kontakt mit Kunden
* Sehr gute Deutsch\\- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
**Das können Sie von uns erwarten**
-----------------------------------

* Führendes und kontinuierlich wachsendes Unternehmen der Medizintechnik
* Dynamisches Umfeld mit hervorragendem Arbeitsklima, das sich durch Flexibilität und Eigenverantwortung auszeichnet
* Anspruchsvolle und abwechslungsreiche Projekte
* Viele Möglichkeiten zur Mitgestaltung sowie zur persönlichen und fachlichen Entwicklung
* Bezahlung nach Tarifvertrag, ggf. Prämien\\- und Bonuszahlungen
* Arbeitszeit 40h/Woche
* 30 Tage Urlaub pro Jahr
* Flexible Arbeitszeiten
* Attraktive Zuschüsse: Mittagessen, Deutschlandticket und betriebliche Altersvorsorge (bAV)
* Corporate Benefits (Bonusprogramm für Mitarbeiter)
* Homeoffice nach Absprache für ein paar Tage pro Woche möglich
* JobRad
**Wir machen Sinn.**
--------------------


Haben wir Ihr Interesse geweckt? Dann bewerben Sie sich jetzt über unser Online\\-Bewerberportal.  

  

**Löwenstein Medical Technology**  

**GmbH \\+ Co. KG**  

**Standort Hamburg**  

**Kronsaalsweg 40**  

**22525 Hamburg**

ARE YOU A CURRENT US FOODS EMPLOYEE? PLEASE APPLY DIRECTLY THROUGH OUR INTERNAL WORKDAY CAREER SITE
   

  

 Join Our Community of Food People!
   

  

 As a Email Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective email marketing campaigns tailored to our B2B audience.
   

  

****This position is virtual/remote which means the work can be completed from anywhere is the United States except Hawaii or United States Territories.****
**Responsibilities**
* Campaign Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement comprehensive email marketing strategies that align with business objectives and target B2B customers.
* Salesforce Marketing Cloud: Utilize your knowledge of Salesforce Marketing Cloud to create, customize, and optimize email templates, automation journeys, and customer segmentation.
* Content Creation: Work closely with content creators to develop engaging email content, including newsletters, product announcements, event invitations, and more.
* A/B Testing: Conduct A/B tests on subject lines, email copy, design, and calls\\-to\\-action to optimize open rates, click\\-through rates, and conversion rates.
* Segmentation: Create and manage segmented email lists to deliver targeted messages to specific B2B customer segments, ensuring relevant and personalized content.
* Automation: Develop and maintain automated email workflows, drip campaigns, and trigger\\-based emails to nurture leads and engage customers throughout their journey.
* Data Analysis: Monitor email campaign performance, analyze metrics, and provide actionable insights to optimize campaigns for better results.
* Compliance: Stay informed about email marketing regulations (e.g., CAN\\-SPAM, GDPR) and ensure all email campaigns adhere to legal requirements.
* Reporting: Generate regular reports on email marketing performance and share insights and recommendations with stakeholders.
* Emerging Trends: Stay up\\-to\\-date with industry trends and emerging ad technologies and best practices to identify new opportunities for growth and innovation.
* Other duties as assigned by manager


**RELATIONSHIPS**
* Internal: Work closely with key stakeholders across marketing and creative teams.


**WORK ENVIRONMENT** 
 (Select one)
   

  

* Remote: This role is fully remote, and the associate is expected to perform assigned responsibilities from a home\\-based environment.


**Minimum Qualifications**
* 3 years of experience in email marketing, preferably in the B2B space.
* Experience in Salesforce Marketing Cloud and other marketing automation tools.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, with an eye for detail.
* Analytical mindset and the ability to translate data into actionable recommendations.
* Knowledge of B2B marketing best practices and trends.


**EDUCATION**
* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.


**CERTIFICATIONS/TRAINING**
* Certification in Salesforce Marketing Cloud is a plus.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with HTML and CSS is a plus.


 This role will also receive annual incentive plan bonus.
   

  

 Benefits for this role may include health insurance, pre\\-tax spending accounts, retirement benefits, paid time off, short\\-term and long\\-term disability, employee stock purchase plan, and life insurance. To review available benefits, please click here: https://www.usfoods.com/careers/benefits.html.
   

  

 Compensation depends on relevant experience and/or education, specific skills, function, geographic location, and other factors as applicable by law (for example: state minimum wage thresholds). The expected base rate for this role is between
   

  

 $55,000 \\- $90,000

jd:
***Are you looking for a role in a company that's solving one of the greatest challenges of our lifetime?***
 Ophelia helps people end their opioid use and restore their quality of life with respect for their time and dignity. Our mission is to make evidence\\-based treatments for opioid use disorder (OUD) accessible to everyone... and we're looking to bring more people onto our team to help us achieve it.
   

  

 Ophelia is a venture\\-backed, healthcare startup that helps individuals with OUD by providing FDA\\-approved medication and clinical care through a telehealth platform. Our approach is discreet, convenient, and affordable. We've been successfully operating in 14 states for almost four years and we're excited to continue our growth. We are a team of doctors, scientists, startup veterans, and White House advisors, backed by leading technology and healthcare investors working to re\\-imagine and re\\-build OUD treatment in America.
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Marketing Analyst, you will play a critical role in driving business growth by analyzing data, identifying trends, and delivering insights that inform strategic decisions. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including product and data analytic teams, to optimize customer acquisition, retention, and revenue generation. As a Marketing Analyst, your insights will help drive targeted marketing strategies, improve the patient experience, and enhance customer engagement through data\\-driven decision making.
   

  

 The marketing team is a small, but critically important piece of the business. This role will be collaborative and will work closely with both Growth and Content Marketing, to help better understand what resonates with patients. We have weekly touchbases to review prior week performance and consistent one on one meetings to help with professional development.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Tracks and evaluates the effectiveness of marketing campaigns across channels (paid media, email, social, etc.), providing insights to optimize ROI
* Analyzes customer behavior, demographics, and preferences to improve targeting and personalization strategies
* Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance metrics (KPIs)
* Conduct A/B tests and other experiments to optimize marketing initiatives
* Collaborate with Operations and Product teams to design and evaluate growth strategies
* Use statistical analysis and data modeling to identify patterns and predict future trends
* Provide actionable insights and recommendations to enhance customer acquisition, engagement, and retention
* Monitor and report on the effectiveness of growth strategies and campaigns
* Identifies industry trends, competitor movements, and market opportunities


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Business/Marketing, Economics, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field
* 2\\+ years of experience in growth and marketing analysis in DTC brands
* Proficiency in SQL and data visualization tools (e.g., Looker)
* Advanced skills in analyzing and setting up Google and Meta ads
* Knowledge of digital marketing channels and customer journey optimization.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail
* Experience with A/B testing and statistical methodologies
* Ability to communicate complex data insights in a clear and actionable manner
* Familiarity with marketing analytics, customer segmentation, and lifecycle analysis


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with Python or R for statistical analysis
* Experience working in fast\\-paced, cross\\-functional environments (startup experience preferred)


**Our Benefits Include**
* Remote work anywhere in the United States
* Competitive medical, vision, and health insurance (many plans are fully covered for the employee!)
* 20 days of PTO per year
* 10 company holidays
* $950 Work From Home Stipend
* 401k Contribution Platform
* Additional benefits offered through our benefits provider such as life insurance, short and long term disability, financial wellness, virtual primary care, among others!


**Ophelia Compensation Overview**
* We set compensation based on the level and skills required for the role. We value pay transparency and equity, and are committed to fair pay. In order to prevent pay disparities and reduce time spent in negotiations, we take a “first and best” offer approach: this means we’re not holding any compensation back from our candidates, and you can feel confident that our pay is fair and does not vary based on the strength of someone’s negotiation skills.
* Compensation is dynamic at Ophelia: as long as the company performs well and meets our targets, there will be opportunities for increased compensation annually. We’re happy to discuss this approach and our bands if you have questions during the interview process.


 Compensation Range
   

  

 $85,000 \\- $95,000 USD
   

  

 Interested in learning more about Ophelia and this role? Apply to work with us!

jd:
**About Alice Walk** 




 Alice Walk is a fast\\-growing women’s clothing brand founded on the belief that pairing classic silhouettes with beautiful, high\\-quality materials is the key to creating a fresh\\-yet\\-timeless wardrobe. We believe less is so much more. Classic, clean and truly timeless – that is our design philosophy. Those special staples you love and will wear for years to come. All of our clothing is designed in\\-house and then thoughtfully produced in small batches by expert factory partners around the world. Alice Walk is run by a small team based out of Boston, and all of our fulfillment is done in\\-house!
 



  





 Website: www.alicewalk.com
 



 Instagram: @alice\\_walk
 



  





**ABOUT THE ROLE** 




 We are looking for a highly motivated, detail\\-oriented and creative individual who loves all things
 



 content and marketing. This role will report directly to our Brand Director and will be responsible
 



 for a wide variety of marketing related tasks including: content creation, social media
 



 management, photoshoot assistance, email marketing and more. We are a small, tight\\-knit group
 



 that is passionate about the growth and reputation of our brand – and one that deeply values
 



 relationships, team culture and an energized, positive work environment. Given the size of our
 



 team and stage of our business, we are looking for someone who is entrepreneurial at heart – and
 



 excited about the prospect of an ever changing work day as well as wearing a lot of different hats!
 



  





**DUTIES \\+ RESPONSIBILITIES:** 




**CONTENT CREATION** 



* Creating engaging content (reels, static posts, IG stories, etc) to support various marketing initiatives – including product launches, special promotions, digital ads, our Nantucket store, behind the scenes footage and more
* Eagerness to learn and own the editing of team/UGC video content through various social media apps (such as CapCut; note \\- if you’re not familiar with this platform, we can train you on it)
* Comfortable and excited to be behind an (iphone!) camera filming your own video / photo content that can be turned into supplemental marketing assets – Instagram reels, digital ads, etc
* Support marketing initiatives by taking your own organic UGC product photos



  





**CONTENT COORDINATION** 



* Manage and organize influencer content as well as our internal team content
* Find creative ways to utilize past content in fresh and exciting ways
* Organize product imagery from our professional photoshoots that are used for website product pages and other marketing materials



  





**SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGEMENT** 



* Develop and execute the weekly social media schedule for our brand IG page – inclusive of static posts, reels, stories and written captions
* Curate on\\-brand non\\-product content for our IG page (i.e. home, travel inspiration)
* Ensure brand voice and visual identity are consistent across all content and captions
* Manage the paid spend (i.e. “boosting”) behind select organic IG posts/reels to support reach and follower growth
* Monitor key metrics and analyze social media performance using Instagram insights
* Spearhead other social media initiatives such as Giveaways (our own as well as brand collaborations), saving stories to highlights, utilizing our Broadcast channel and more
* Strategically explore and build out other social media channels for the brand (TikTok, Pinterest, etc)



  





**EMAIL MARKETING** 



* If you don’t have experience executing email marketing, don’t worry! We can train the right candidate for this
* Work closely with the Brand Director on our email strategy and building out our weekly email schedule to support product launches, restocks, promotions, events and more
* Learn and eventually own our email marketing platform, Klaviyo, to execute weekly emails using our pre\\-built brand templates and product imagery
* Openness to learning design tools such as Illustrator to help build out more complex emails



  





**BRAND MARKETING SUPPORT** 



* Support the Brand Director and entire marketing team on any and all Brand Marketing initiatives – such as product and lifestyle photography, marketing collateral, event / pop\\-up activations, collaborations and brand growth initiatives (such as direct mail)
* Take ownership of photoshoot coordination \\- including the booking of models/HMU, the day\\-of schedule, shot lists, prop sourcing, on set direction, etcSKILLS \\& REQUIREMENTS:
* Extremely detail oriented, creative and entrepreneurial
* Interest in fashion and strong sense of personal style
* Ability to organize and prioritize multiple projects in a fluid environment
* Excited about content creation with the ability to edit video footage
* Consider yourself social media savvy – particularly with Instagram
* Experience with Klaviyo and Illustrator (or comparable design platform) is a plus, but not required
* Excellent communication skills



  





**DETAILS:** 



* Full time, 40 hours per week Monday through Friday
* This a remote position \\- most of our team is either Boston or Florida based
* Salary (to be determined based on experience)
* Paid holidays and time off
* Health Insurance Coverage
* 401k with company match
* Generous employee clothing discount



  





 If you’re interested in this position, please email hello@alicewalk.com using the subject line “Content \\& Marketing Coordinator” along with the following:
 


* Your resume
* A brief email explaining why you would be a good fit for this role
* Film a 30 second iphone video styling your favorite sweater (doesn’t need to be Alice Walk!) as a pretend Instagram reel (see our IG feed for inspiration!). \\*\\*This can be sent to us as a Google Drive link or via WeTransfer
* Find your favorite Alice Walk Instagram post from the last 60 days and tell us why you think it’s effective. Find another Alice Walk post that you think could use improvement and let us know how you would change it

Mit über **60 tollen Kolleg\\*innen**, einer eigenen Software und **mehr als 3 Millionen Artikeln** sind wir auf über 15 Marktplätzen rund um den Globus unterwegs. Und das seit über 15 Jahren!

Jetzt brauchen wir **dich** als Verstärkung für unser Marketplace\\-Team!

\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-

* ·Du entwickelst mit uns **Strategien**, um noch erfolgreicher zu verkaufen
* ·Du sitzt an der Schnittstelle zu **IT, Logistik, Einkauf \\& Kundenservice**
* ·Und wenn **neue Marktplätze** an den Start gehen – bist du mit am Start!

\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-

* ·Eine **kaufmännische Ausbildung**
* ·Erste Erfahrung im **marktplatzbezogenen E\\-Commerce**
* ·Technikverständnis \\& Interesse an Plattformstrukturen
* ·Excel ist für dich kein Feind – sondern ein Werkzeug
* ·Du bist analytisch, selbstorganisiert und teamfähig

\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-

**Was wir dir bieten (und das meinen wir auch so!):** 

* Flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle (40, 35 oder 30 Std./Woche) an 5 Tagen! Ein cooles,
* motiviertes Team, das zusammenhält Raum für deine Ideen \\& echte
* Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten Flache Hierarchien \\& kurze Entscheidungswege
* Kaffee, Wasser \\& Obst gehen aufs Haus – immer

\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-

**Teamwork, Innovation \\& Erfolg** – bei uns ist das kein Buzzword\\-Bingo, sondern Alltag. Wenn du Bock hast, was zu bewegen, dann freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbung!

Art der Stelle: Vollzeit, Festanstellung

Arbeitszeiten:

* Gleitzeit
* Keine Wochenenden

Leistungen:

jd:
* Neumann\\&Müller Veranstaltungstechnik
* Köln
* Berufserfahrung
* Marketing, Kommunikation, PR
* Vollzeit
**Wer wir sind**
----------------


Wir sind stark und erfolgreich – schon mehr als 40 Jahre – weil wir ein Team sind. Ein Team mit 20 Standorten in Deutschland und unterschiedlichsten Berufsfeldern, die miteinander Hand\\-in\\-Hand interagieren – immer mit dem Blick auf kreative, kundenspezifische Techniklösungen für vielfältige Events. Damit Erlebnisse entstehen, die in Erinnerung bleiben. Wir sind N\\&M.  

  

Vertriebsunterlagen erstellen, Anzeigen für Social Media schalten, Interviews koordinieren, Videoskripte schreiben und die Umsetzung planen – und das an einem Tag. Als Marketeer ist immer was zu tun und Abwechslung geboten. Wir sind ein kleines, aber effektives Marketing\\-Team, das flexibel zwischen Themen springt und sich an jedem Punkt offen und ehrlich unterstützt. Denn über unsere Events, Leistungen und Kolleg:innen soll jederzeit gesprochen werden.  

  

Komm zu uns ins Team. Werde eine:r von uns und lass uns gemeinsam erfolgreich sein.**Deine Aufgaben bei uns**
--------------------------

* In Deiner Hand liegt die inhaltliche, strategische und strukturelle Verantwortung des Content\\-Planes für unsere sozialen Netzwerke
* Die zielgruppengerechte Bespielung und ein guter Content\\-Mix auf den Social Media Kanälen sind Deine Leidenschaft und absoluter Alltag, vorzugsweise LinkedIn und Instagram (aber auch Facebook, Vimeo, YouTube und TikTok)
* Du verantwortest und arbeitest mit an Konzeption und Umsetzung von Social Media Kampagnen – auch mit Fokus auf Employer Branding und Recruiting
* Für Videoproduktionen entwirfst Du Konzepte und Drehpläne, sorgst für Freigaben und koordinierst die Umsetzung
**Was Du mitbringst**
---------------------

* Eine fundierte Ausbildung oder ein abgeschlossenes Studium im Bereich Social Media Marketing / Online\\-Marketing sowie nachweisbare Berufserfahrung sind Voraussetzung
* Die Kampagnenmanager von LinkedIn und Meta sind Dir bestens vertraut
* Du hast bereits auf Unternehmensseite im Marketing im B2B\\-Umfeld Erfahrungen gesammelt
* Kommunikationsfreude und gute Networking\\-Skills aber auch die Begeisterung für Communities zeichnen Dich aus. Das Communitymanagement übernimmst Du gerne und hast immer im Blick, was auf den Kanälen gesprochen wird.
* Du hast ein gutes Gespür für das zielgruppenspezifische Texten und setzt obendrauf das kleine Quäntchen speziellen Wortwitz
* Flexible Arbeitszeiten und Eigenverantwortung gehören für Dich zum Alltag: Du bewegst Dich auch mal am späten Nachmittag oder Abend noch online, bist dafür tagsüber aber gerne frei in Deiner Zeitgestaltung
**Was wir mitbringen**
----------------------

* **Einzigartige Unternehmenskultur:** Bei uns erwartet Dich eine einzigartige Arbeitskultur, die geprägt ist von Offenheit, Zusammenhalt und Respekt.
* **Individuelle Weiterbildung:** Wir unterstützen Dich bei Deiner beruflichen Weiterentwicklung mit auf Dich zugeschnittene Schulungs\\- und Fortbildungsangeboten.
* **Betriebliche Altersvorsorge:** Bei uns bist Du abgesichert, wir bieten Dir eine betriebliche Altersvorsorge an.
* **JobRad\\-Angebot:** Wir unterstützen Deine Gesundheit und tun gleichzeitig etwas für die Nachhaltigkeit mit unserem JobRad\\-Angebot.
* **Vereinbarkeit von Freizeit, Familie und Beruf:** Wir legen großen Wert auf Deine Work\\-Life\\-Balance und bieten Dir flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle. (Home Office, Workation, …)
* **Unbefristetes Arbeitsverhältnis:** Bei uns bekommst Du langfristige Perspektiven.
* **Gute Anbindung:** Unsere Standorte sind optimal an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr angebunden, damit Du schnell und bequem zur Arbeit kommst und auch wieder nach Hause.
* **Parkmöglichkeiten:** Bei uns findest Du ausreichend Parkmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Nähe.
* **Kostengünstige Mobilität:** Wir unterstützen Dich mit einem Zuschuss zum Deutschlandticket, damit du bequem und kostengünstig zu Arbeit pendeln kannst.
**Du bist interessiert?**

Innerhalb der Messe Frankfurt\\-Familie ist die Mesago Messe Frankfurt GmbH auf B2B\\-Formate zu aktuellen Technologiethemen spezialisiert. Die Wurzeln unserer Technologie\\-Brands liegen auf dem Gebiet der Fachmessen und Konferenzen, doch in den letzten Jahren haben wir um unsere bewährten Formate herum auch neue Kommunikationsplattformen kreiert. So bringen wir die führenden Player aus Industrie und Wissenschaft persönlich, digital oder auch hybrid zusammen und sind immer auf dem aktuellen Stand der Entwicklungen.



Unsere Mitarbeitenden können die Zukunft des Unternehmens aktiv mitgestalten und wir bieten ihnen dafür ein hohes Maß an kreativer Freiheit und Eigenverantwortung. Aktuell benötigen wir Verstärkung im Bereich Corporate Communication. Wir suchen nach einer Person, die unser Team mit ihrer Leidenschaft für Kommunikation sowie frischen Ideen zur Vermarktung unserer Dachmarke bereichert.



Sie brennen für Digital Marketing und starke Kommunikation? Werden Sie Teil unseres Teams!



Bewerben Sie sich bei uns als **Digital Marketing Manager (m/w/d) für die Unternehmenskommunikation** am Standort **Stuttgart**.


### **Welchen Bereich Sie bei uns mitgestalten können**


* Sie bauen unsere digitale Marketing\\-Expertise weiter aus – insbesondere in den Bereichen E\\-Mail\\-Marketing, SEO und SEA
* Das E\\-Mail\\-Marketing entwickeln Sie strategisch weiter, indem Sie interne Schulungen durchführen, Wissen weitergeben und Best Practices etablieren
* Auch die rechtlichen, technischen und organisatorischen Rahmenbedingungen behalten Sie im Blick und sorgen für deren Einhaltung
* Sie entwickeln klare Roadmaps und Meilensteine, um digitale Maßnahmen erfolgreich in bestehende Kommunikationsprozesse zu integrieren
* Neue Technologien und Trends im digitalen Marketingumfeld beobachten Sie aufmerksam – und bewerten deren Nutzen für unser Unternehmen fundiert

### **Was Sie mitbringen sollten**


* Ein erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium im Bereich Betriebswirtschaft oder eine vergleichbare Qualifikation bildet die Grundlage Ihrer Expertise
* In den Bereichen SEO, SEA (z. B. Google Ads) sowie im E\\-Mail\\- und Content\\-Marketing verfügen Sie über fundierte Kenntnisse
* Ihre Kommunikationsstärke, gepaart mit Teamorientierung und der Freude an einem dynamischen Arbeitsumfeld, zeichnet Sie aus
* Mit Ihrem sympathischen, professionellen Auftreten überzeugen Sie sowohl intern als auch extern

### **Was Sie von uns erwarten können**


* Wir legen viel Wert auf eine offene Arbeitsatmosphäre mit ausreichend Raum für eigene Ideen
* Unser modernes Büro liegt in zentraler Lage am Stuttgarter Feuersee
* Wir stellen jedem Mitarbeiter ergonomische Schreibtische, Getränke sowie ein umfassendes Angebot zur Gesundheitsförderung zur Verfügung
* Unser flexibles Arbeitszeitmodell beinhaltet Zeiterfassung, Überstundenausgleich und die Option 50 % der Zeit mobil zu arbeiten
* Ein unbefristeter Arbeitsvertrag mit einem attraktiven Gehaltspaket und regelmäßigen Fort\\- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten bietet Sicherheit und Perspektive


**Finden Sie, das klingt gut?** Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre vollständige Online\\-Bewerbung mit Angabe des Gehaltswunsches, einer Information, wo Sie auf diese Position aufmerksam geworden sind und des möglichen Eintrittsdatums.

#### **Samia Boutari**

Das Sportmarketing der Schwarz Gruppe vereint die Sportengagements und Partnerschaften unter einem Dach.  

Als Teil des Sportmarketings arbeitest Du in einem dynamischen Umfeld, in dem wir spannende Kooperationen mit Vereinen und Organisationen gestalten und gemeinsam mit den Unternehmen der Schwarz Gruppe weiterentwickeln. Mit unserer Leidenschaft für den Sport schaffen wir einzigartige Momente und begeistern Fans sowie Partner gleichermaßen.
Dein Spielfeld* **Verantwortung:** Du bist als Bereichsleiter für den Aufbau, die Entwicklung und Führung der spartenübergreifenden Activation Unit in der Schwarz Gruppe zuständig
* **Ansprechpartner:** Du bist interner Ansprechpartner und verlässliche Schnittstelle für die Unternehmen der Schwarz Gruppe im Bereich Sportmarketing\\-Aktivierung und arbeitest eng mit der Abteilung Partnerships zusammen, um die Durchführung der Aktivierungen sicherzustellen
* **Operative Exzellenz:** Du unterstützt die Sparten bei der Aktivierung der Sport\\-Partnerschaften und entwickelst gemeinsam relevante Aktivierungsmaßnahmen. Bei Bedarf steuerst Du mit deinem Team auch ganzheitliche Aktivierungen
* **Koordination**: Du arbeitest spartenübergreifend mit den Teams unserer Sparten zusammen und koordinierst sowie priorisierst zeitgleich verschiedene cross\\-funktionale Projekte. Dabei schaffst Du Synergie\\- und Optimierungspotenziale und stellst den internen Knowhow\\-Transfer sicher
* **Stakeholdermanagement:** Du pflegst starke Beziehungen zu Schlüsselkontakten innerhalb von Sportorganisationen und bist zudem vertrauenswürdiger Ansprechpartner für Kunden, Multiplikatoren oder strategische Partner
* **Repräsentation:** Du repräsentierst die Schwarz Gruppe (intern/extern) und vertrittst diese auf fachbezogenen Events und Veranstaltungen
* **Handlungsempfehlungen:** Du erstellst professionelle Präsentationen sowie Vorlagen für das Top\\-Management und unterstützt mit fundierten Handlungsempfehlungen sowie klaren Entscheidungsvorlagen
* **Benchmark:** Du informierst dich proaktiv zu aktuellen Branchenentwicklungen und relevanten Aktivierungstrends

Deine Spielerdaten* Du begeisterst dich für diverse Sportarten: Von Fußball über Handball bis Radsport und Eishockey
* Du hast dein Studium im Bereich Betriebswirtschaft, (Sport\\-)Management oder (Sport\\-)Marketing erfolgreich abgeschlossen oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung mit einschlägiger Erfahrung im sportökonomischen Bereich oder (Sport\\-)Marketing absolviert
* Du hast bereits mehrjährige Erfahrung (8\\+ Jahre) im Sportmarketing / Sportsponsoring oder Agenturen im Rahmen von Aktivierungsmaßnahmen
* Du hast Führungserfahrung (5\\+ Jahre) bzw. Erfahrung im Umgang mit interdisziplinären Matrixorganisationen sammeln können
* Du hast starke konzeptionelle, strategische und problemlösende Fähigkeiten sowie Professionalität und Diplomatie bei der Interaktion mit verschiedenen Interessengruppen
* Du verfügst über ausgeprägte Kommunikations\\- und Präsentationsfähigkeiten, Empathie sowie organisatorisches Geschick, Umsetzungsstärke und eine Hands\\-on\\-Mentalität
* Du besitzt die Fähigkeit, komplexe geschäftliche Herausforderungen effektiv zu lösen, umsetzbare Empfehlungen zu entwickeln sowie mehrere Projekte zu managen
* Deine Arbeitsweise zeichnet sich durch ergebnisorientiertes und zuverlässiges Arbeiten aus sowie Spaß daran, Themen zu treiben und die Bereitschaft, die Extrameile zu gehen
* Sport ist für dich eine 24/7 Leidenschaft: Daher sind Sportevents \\& Reisetätigkeiten am Wochenende kein Hindernis für dich
* Du arbeitest gerne im Team und möchtest gemeinsam Großes bewegen
* Du sprichst sehr gut Deutsch und Englisch

Unsere Benefits

jd:
At Theory, we create clothes that matter, that empower and improve the way we live through exceptional fit, fabric, and style. In 1997, Theory was founded in New York on the simple idea that stretch fabrics in tailored clothing could change how we dress and live.
 



  





 Two decades later, we continue to perfect our offering of elevated wardrobe essentials for the ambitious, urban man and woman. From sourcing materials from the best mills in the world, to the innovation and craftsmanship at our atelier in New York’s Meatpacking District, the integrity of our process is just as important as our final product.
 



  





 In 2004, Theory was acquired by Fast Retailing, spurring international expansion of the brand. Operating 440 stores worldwide, today Theory is a New York brand with a global mindset. Our customers dream big, achieve goals, and aim for perfection. So do we, and so do our clothes.
 



  





 The
 **Visual Merchandising Coordinator** 
 will support the Brand Image through the communication and implementation of the Visual Merchandising presentations across all retail /wholesale stores. This role will act as the liaison between the field and corporate offices, communicating between the two to ensure thoughtful decisions are made to best drive sales, support the field team, and uphold Theory’s visual standards.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




***Visual Merchandising***



* Travel to floor set store to execute and photograph merchandise layout
* Create visual directive in InDesign
* Assist stores with floor\\-set planning and execution
* Provide feedback to stores on visual strengths and opportunities
* Partner with the Buying team to ensure that all promotional in\\-store marketing is communicated and available
* Participate in the mapping process to layout future deliveries
* Assist in the development and creation of all visual merchandising educational materials, specifically how to manuals and standards manuals
* Provide stores with all tools necessary to succeed in visual execution
* Manage fixture, hardware and prop inventories and allocations for stores



  





***Operations and Project Planning***



* Work within weekly/monthly planning calendars for all visual merchandising projects
* Provide chain\\-wide communication with visual merchandising material including visual changes, updates, and announcements



  





***New Store Opening***



* Support in the design of floor plans with merchandise zoning and flow of product
* Assist on special projects related to store design
* Assist on execution of New Store Openings through established processes and procedures
* Communicate important dates and deadlines to corporate and field teams
* Partner with Store Construction on deliveries and installations



  





**Requirements** 



* 1\\-3 years visual merchandising experience required
* Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and Microsoft Office
* Excellent oral and written communication skills
* In\\-store retail experience a plus
* Bachelors degree



  





 Salary range: $65,000\\.00 \\-$75,000\\.00\\*
 



  





 \\*The offered salary or salary range is based on several factors, including, but not limited to, overall experience, relevant experience, education level, certifications, applicable skills and expertise, and location of the position.
 



  





*As an Equal Opportunity Employer, Fast Retailing does not discriminate against applicants or employees because of race, color, creed, religion, sex, national origin, veteran status, disability, age, citizenship, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or because of any other status or condition protected by applicable federal, state or local law.* 




  





*Ensure your Theory job offer is legitimate and don’t fall victim to fraud. Theory never seeks payment from job applicants. Feel free to ask your recruiter for a phone call or other type of communication for an interview and ensure your communication is coming from a Theory or sister company email address. For added security, where possible, apply directly through our job posting.*

jd:
Teamwork makes the stream work.
   

**Roku is changing how the world watches TV** 
  


 Roku is the \\#1 TV streaming platform in the U.S., Canada, and Mexico, and we've set our sights on powering every television in the world. Roku pioneered streaming to the TV. Our mission is to be the TV streaming platform that connects the entire TV ecosystem. We connect consumers to the content they love, enable content publishers to build and monetize large audiences, and provide advertisers unique capabilities to engage consumers.
 


  


 From your first day at Roku, you'll make a valuable \\- and valued \\- contribution. We're a fast\\-growing public company where no one is a bystander. We offer you the opportunity to delight millions of TV streamers around the world while gaining meaningful experience across a variety of disciplines.
 


  


  
 


 About the team
   


 The world is cutting the cord and streaming its TV online, a shift that has dramatically changed how advertisers target, reach and measure their preferred audiences in ways that broadcast TV and cable never could.
 


  


 Roku Ads Manager is our answer to the growing demand in streaming advertising. Our self\\-serve platform just entered General Availability (GA) in September 2024 and has picked up major momentum. Our Ads Manager team is small, gritty, and focused on scaling the best streaming ad platform in the market. We move fast, pivot quickly, and work hard. We rally around decisions, challenge assumptions, and push the limits on what advertising can do for growth marketers, performance agencies, and any other business interested in making the big screen work for their brands’ objectives. 
   

 The Roku Ads Manager team is looking for an Account Executive to help us scale our platform.
 


  

  
   

 About the role
   


 TV ads were once reserved for large national brands. Roku believes that it’s better for streamers, brands, and our company that all businesses have a path to advertising in streaming. Roku Ads Manager is our answer to democratizing streaming advertising, creating a self\\-serve path for businesses of any size to get their brand on the big screen.
 


  


 Roku Ads Manager is looking for an Account Executive to help lead demand generation and client growth for our self\\-serve streaming ad platform. 
 


  


 Below are some key roles and responsibilities:
 


  

  
* **Prospecting:** 
 Identify and target large pools potential advertisers who could benefit from Roku Ads Manager’s self\\-serve ad platform. Use creative solutions to segment the market, build addressable lead list cohorts, and prioritize those for maximum return on outreach (i.e. sign ups \\+ revenue).
  
* **Outreach:** 
 Initiate contact with potential advertisers through various channels, including email, platform\\-direct messaging, zoom calls, and social media. Clearly communicate the value proposition of our self\\-serve ad platform and how it can meet the advertiser's objectives.
  
* **Qualification:** 
 Qualify leads to ensure they align with the ideal customer profile and are likely to benefit from the platform. Once qualified, ensure these advertisers have the resources and info they need to start spending, offering onboarding services if required.
  
* **Onboarding:** 
 Assist qualified new advertisers in setting up their accounts and campaigns, as needed. This includes answering questions, recommending best practices, and demoing the platform directly to brands. Once onboarded, you’ll have the chance to grow the leads you feel have potential for meaningful revenue impact.
  
* **Nurture \\& Support:** 
 Cultivate relationships with top brands to encourage long\\-term engagement and loyalty. Collaborate with advertisers to optimize their campaigns for better performance. Gather feedback from brands, beneficial to both advertiser growth and Roku product improvements. Answer questions from advertisers via our support channels.
  
* **Upselling:** 
 Identify opportunities for upselling additional features or services to existing advertisers. Collaborate with other teams to maximize revenue from existing clients.
  
* **Reporting:** 
 Generate and provide regular reports to management on key metrics, conversion rates, and the overall success of our platform. Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the success of ad campaigns on the platform.
  


  


 In summary, Ads Manager AE's play a pivotal role in driving customer acquisition, ensuring successful onboarding, and fostering ongoing relationships with advertisers to maximize revenue and satisfaction. AE's are directly responsible for building relationships and helping clients and agencies drive business results through consultative selling, education, and client service.
   

 Ideal candidates will have the ability to drive advertisers’ marketing strategy coupled with a willingness to roll up their sleeves and execute the tactics. Success in this position requires exceptional prioritization skills to differentiate service by priority accounts while delivering best\\-in\\-class customer service to everyone.
 


  


 You will be an individual contributor, while also maintaining an ownership mindset when it comes to influencing the product, working cross\\-functionally, and scaling.
 


  


 The role is fast\\-paced in a particularly high\\-growth area, requiring the ability to work autonomously in an ever\\-changing environment. 
 


  


 Sound like fun? 
 


  


 For New York Only \\- The estimated annual salary for this position is between $56,00 and $85,000 annually.
 


  


 Compensation packages are based on factors unique to each candidate, including but not limited to skill set, certifications, and specific geographical location.
 


  


 This role is eligible for incentive compensation/commissions, health insurance, equity awards, life insurance, disability benefits, parental leave, wellness benefits, and paid time off.
 


  


  
 


  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  
* Prospect potential advertisers and agencies who can benefit from Roku’s solutions to grow their business
  
* Actively participate in all phases of the sales lifecycle including identifying and developing leads; meeting with future and existing clients; developing value propositions; and closing business
  
* Operate at scale, managing a high volume of accounts by identifying opportunities and prioritizing service according to revenue and potential
  
* Understand clients’ business and translate marketing objectives into results for advertisers, growing advertiser investment on the Roku self\\-serve ad platform
  
* Communicate effectively with advertisers, as well as internal Roku stakeholders; identify and communicate opportunities internally to improve Roku’s products based on advertiser feedback
  


  

  
   

 We’re excited if you have
   

  
* Working knowledge of digital advertising marketplace, buying models, and technology
  
* 2\\+ years working in sales, growth marketing and/or a client facing role. Bonus points for working in client\\-facing roles at ad networks or mobile gaming companies
  
* Demonstrated ability in crafting and sending a high volume of personalized emails and overcoming objections
  
* Strength in ability to communicate value on the phone, in email, and over video demos
  
* Thrive when operating at scale, using data to drive operations and execution
  
* The ability to effectively collaborate with internal support and cross functional teams, while autonomously managing your own book of business
  
* Ambition for building from the ground up and seeking constant improvement for the business
  
* A naturally curious mindset, eager to learn and grow in a fast paced, dynamic environment
  
* A self\\-starter who’s hungry to attack new challenges that come with building a new line of business
  
* A growth hacker who believes in helping brands of any size grow with streaming ads
  


  

**Benefits** 
  


 Roku is committed to offering a diverse range of benefits as part of our compensation package to support our employees and their families. Our comprehensive benefits include global access to mental health and financial wellness support and resources. Local benefits include statutory and voluntary benefits which may include healthcare (medical, dental, and vision), life, accident, disability, commuter, and retirement options (401(k)/pension). Our employees can take time off work for vacation and other personal reasons to balance their evolving work and life needs. It's important to note that not every benefit is available in all locations or for every role. For details specific to your location, please consult with your recruiter.
 


  


  
 


  

**The Roku Culture** 
  


 Roku is a great place for people who want to work in a fast\\-paced environment where everyone is focused on the company's success rather than their own. We try to surround ourselves with people who are great at their jobs, who are easy to work with, and who keep their egos in check. We appreciate a sense of humor. We believe a fewer number of very talented folks can do more for less cost than a larger number of less talented teams. We're independent thinkers with big ideas who act boldly, move fast and accomplish extraordinary things through collaboration and trust. In short, at Roku you'll be part of a company that's changing how the world watches TV.
 


  


 We have a unique culture that we are proud of. We think of ourselves primarily as problem\\-solvers, which itself is a two\\-part idea. We come up with the solution, but the solution isn't real until it is built and delivered to the customer. That penchant for action gives us a pragmatic approach to innovation, one that has served us well since 2002\\.
 


  


 To learn more about Roku, our global footprint, and how we've grown, visit https://www.weareroku.com/factsheet.
 


  


 By providing your information, you acknowledge that you have read our Applicant Privacy Notice and authorize Roku to process your data subject to those terms.

jd:
Since we opened our doors in 2009, the world of commerce has evolved immensely, and so has Square. After enabling anyone to take payments and never miss a sale, we saw sellers stymied by disparate, outmoded products and tools that wouldn’t work together.
   

  

 So we expanded into software and started building integrated, omnichannel solutions – to help sellers sell online, manage inventory, offer buy now, pay later functionality, book appointments, engage loyal buyers, and hire and pay staff. Across it all, we’ve embedded financial services tools at the point of sale, so merchants can access a business loan and manage their cash flow in one place. Afterpay furthers our goal to provide omnichannel tools that unlock meaningful value and growth, enabling sellers to capture the next generation shopper, increase order sizes, and compete at a larger scale.
   

  

 Today, we are a partner to sellers of all sizes – large, enterprise\\-scale businesses with complex operations, sellers just starting, as well as merchants who began selling with Square and have grown larger over time. As our sellers grow, so do our solutions. There is a massive opportunity in front of us. We’re building a significant, meaningful, and lasting business, and we are helping sellers worldwide do the same.
 


  

**The Role** 
  


 We’re looking for a visionary 
 **Head of Brand \\& Content Marketing** 
 to lead the next chapter of the Square brand. This leader will be a steward for how millions of businesses \\- from coffee shops to complex national brands \\- experience and connect with Square. You'll shape our brand strategy \\& narrative, define the brand foundations — positioning, messaging, identity, and metrics (in partnership with the Insights and Creative teams) —and ensure it shows up with clarity and impact across EVERY touchpoint. You’ll also lead the content strategy that scales our narrative globally. 
 


  


 This role requires a unique blend of brand vision, culture, content mastery, and operational rigor. You will lead the development and execution of brand and content strategies that shape perception, drive awareness, engagement, and build long\\-term affinity for Square. It involves an in\\-depth understanding of businesses and close collaboration with the Marketing, Creative, Insights, Product, Comms teams and more.
 


  

**You Will** 
  

  

  
* **Evangelize the Brand Vision \\& Strategy** 



  

	  
	+ Evangelize and evolve Square’s brand positioning and long\\-term strategy, including establishing clear success metrics
	  
	+ Partner with the Research team to establish foundational customer insights, brand ICPs and track brand health
	  
	+ In partnership with Brand creative, develop foundational brand systems—architecture, guidelines, naming, and governance.
  
* **Craft and Activate a differentiated Brand Narrative** 



  

	  
	+ Shape Square’s voice, story, and messaging to reflect our values and unique POV across paid, owned, earned, product, sales and internal channels.
	  
	+ Partner with product marketing on audience specific messaging that ladders up to the broader brand narrative
	  
	+ Partner with Creative to translate strategy into a compelling, cohesive Brand Identity and breakthrough content.
  
* **Lead Content Strategy, production and distribution** 



  

	  
	+ Lead the global content strategy for Square
	  
	+ Create and distribute compelling content that drives awareness, consideration and engagement through the seller journey
	  
	+ Inspire and lead a high\\-performing content team, including writers, editors, strategists, and operations specialists, fostering a culture of creativity, rigor, and cross\\-functional collaboration.
	  
	+ Champion innovation in content formats, from long\\-form editorial to video, podcasts, interactive, and social storytelling, to keep pace with audience expectations and channel evolution.
	  
	+ Stay ahead of content and media trends, experimenting with emerging platforms, AI tools, and new distribution models to ensure Square is leading, not following, in content innovation.
  
* **Collaborate and Align Across the Org** 



  

	  
	+ Partner with marketing and creative strategy on ensuring marketing tactics and campaigns ladder up to the brand’s strategy
	  
	+ Execute and evangelize the brand’s strategy (purpose, positioning) internally across all brand touchpoints (product, Sales, marketing, CS etc) through data, cultural insight, storytelling, business impact, and deep influence across the org
	  
	+ Partner with strategic leadership to ensure brand strategy ladders up to the business’s strategy; and identifying opportunities to shift strategy based on shifts in product roadmap, business goals, target audience, or company vision
  
* **Champion the Brand Internally** 



  

	  
	+ In partnership with creative, lead the internal rollout, education and adoption of our brand strategy and systems
	  
	+ Inspire teams through clear storytelling, data, and thought leadership that reinforces our brand’s value
  


  

  

**You Have** 
  

  
* 12\\+ years of experience in brand strategy, content marketing —across both agency and in\\-house environments.
  
* A strong track record of building iconic, multi\\-product, high\\-impact brands (B2B and B2C)
  
* Strong storytelling \\& communication skills \\- Should be able to easily take in large amounts of information and summarize it down to its simplest parts – and build a compelling story out of it all.
  
* A strategic thinker with a deep passion for storytelling, culture and creating meaningful brand experiences.
  
* Experience building and leading high\\-performing, diverse teams across brand strategy, editorial, content strategy
  
* Proven experience leading content marketing strategy and operations across multiple channels, formats
  
* Strong leadership and collaboration skills—able to influence senior stakeholders and unify teams around a shared vision.
  
* Experience working closely with creative teams
  
* Deep empathy for small businesses—and the people behind them
  


  

  

  


 We’re working to build a more inclusive economy where our customers have equal access to opportunity, and we strive to live by these same values in building our workplace. Block is an equal opportunity employer evaluating all employees and job applicants without regard to identity or any legally protected class. We will consider qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records for employment in accordance with state and local laws and “fair chance” ordinances. We believe in being fair, and are committed to an inclusive interview experience, including providing reasonable accommodations to disabled applicants throughout the recruitment process. We encourage applicants to share any needed accommodations with their recruiter, who will treat these requests as confidentially as possible.
 **Want to learn more about what we’re doing to build a workplace that is fair and square? Check out our** 
 I\\+D page.
 


  

  


  
   

 Block takes a market\\-based approach to pay, and pay may vary depending on your location. U.S. locations are categorized into one of four zones based on a cost of labor index for that geographic area. The successful candidate’s starting pay will be determined based on job\\-related skills, experience, qualifications, work location, and market conditions. These ranges may be modified in the future.
   

 To find a location’s zone designation, please refer to this resource. If a location of interest is not listed, please speak with a recruiter for additional information.

*Every benefit we offer is designed with one goal: empowering you to do the best work of your career while building the life you want. Remote work, medical insurance, flexible time off, retirement savings plans, and modern family planning are just some of our offering.* 
*Check out our other benefits at Block.* 



  


*Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) builds technology to increase access to the global economy. Each of our brands unlocks different aspects of the economy for more people. 
 **Square** 
  makes commerce and financial services accessible to sellers.

##### **Your tasks:**


You’ll work together with designers, product owners and engineers in a fast moving and product focussed  

environment to deliver innovative solutions.  

* Programming at front and back end
* Further development and improvement of existing source code
* Voluntary, daily discussions about design, architecture, usability and code
* Adding value to the product by implementing new features and functionalities
* Creating responsive, performance driven user interfaces
* Working together with other developers on tasks


##### **Your profile:**


Required skills  

* Bachelor/Master/Diploma in computer science or comparable field (software engineering) – equivalent professional experience is acceptable
* Proficient programming skills in PHP, database MySQL is a must
* Applied knowledge in dealing with React
* Knowledge about web\\-based applications and architectures (SOA, 12 factor, benefits and
* challenges of microservices)
* Desire to constantly improve and capture new concepts, tools and technologies
* Creative and innovative problem\\-solving skills
* Team\\-oriented working style
* Very good English language skills

  

Desired skills \\& experience  

* Experience with agile software development methods and software development best practices,such as unit testing and continuous integration
* Applied knowledge in dealing with React
* Knowledge about Linux, Apache/nginx and PostgreSQL is a plus
* Working with GIT
* Knowledge about containerization technologies like Docker is a plus

  

##### **Why us:**


We’re motivated, driven and believe in the importance of teamwork. We offer unmatched  

opportunities for personal growth and development. Everything to create a convincing and  

rewarding work environment.  

  

We value personal exchange and promote a vibrant team culture, therefore we offer a hybrid work model that requires at least three days of office presence per week and enables home office. Additionally, we provide interesting workation models.  

  

Our team enjoys daily perks such as:  

* Work\\-life balance is important to us. We therefore offer a flexible home office arrangement in coordination with your team lead. It is also possible to spend up to four weeks of workation per year.
* We don‘t only offer the usual fruit basket, but also a free, freshly cooked lunch (organic and regional) from Monday to Friday in our own canteen in Berlin. All colleagues working at other locations receive Sodexo vouchers as an alternative.
* We work in a centrally located loft office in Berlin Kreuzkoelln with plenty of space to share ideas and network.
* We pay for your public transportation ticket up to a max. of 50 EUR per month.
* We offer a pension allowance.
* Your well\\-being is important to us: We have a masseur who comes every week (50% of the costs are borne by the company) and we organize many joint team and company events, from bowling to summer parties to self\\-organized short trips.
* We offer industry\\-standard discounts for your weekend or family vacation (e.g. cheap flights, train tickets, hotel accommodation or even entire vacation packages).
* Our sustainability team is looking forward to your ideas for more sustainability and environmental protection in the company.


##### **About us**


Technoly develops the software for the AERTiCKET Group. AERTiCKET is one of the leading wholesalers for transportation services worldwide. We develop the tools for a successful digital transformation. And we are part of the ongoing evolution towards sustainability of travel agencies, travel consortia and online distribution. We live our start\\-up mentality while offering the security of a global company that has been a reliable and trustworthy business partner for over 25 years. Thanks to our experience in working with airlines, travel agencies and e\\-commerce, we know both sides of the business very well. That's why we can turn requirements and ideas into good source code for meaningful and scalable applications.  

  

We are motivated and committed. And we believe in teamwork. We offer you the best opportunities for your personal growth and development.  

  

We do not only accept differences, we actually believe in the value of diversity. That is why we promote equal rights, equal pay and cooperation on an equal basis regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, disability or age.

**(Senior) Software Engineer C\\# \\& .NET d/f/m**
------------------------------------------------

* **Location(s):**
* Essen, NW, DE, 45141
* London, City of London, GB, EC2R 8HP
* Swindon, Wiltshire, GB, SN5 6PB
**RWE Supply \\& Trading GmbH**

**To start as soon as possible, full time / part time, permanent**

**Functional area:** IT / Digital


**Remuneration:** tariff/non\\-tariff


**Department Insights**

It’s an exciting time to join us! RWE Supply \\& Trading has recently introduced a new cloud based data analytics platform and as part of a new and expanding team we are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to play key role in expanding our platform capability.


Using the latest tech, the Lead in Data (LiD) platform has revolutionised the searching, sharing, transforming and on\\-boarding of Data within our organisation. Data is the fundamental backbone to the company’s trading and analysis communities as well as support functions and will become an ever increasing asset across the group in the future.


You will work apply your expertise in C\\# and .Net to build robust data services within the Mix system and help us future proof our architecture from a security and technological perspective . This role is perfect for someone with strong skills in working with AWS environments.


If this sounds appealing, then apply now!


**Your future responsibilities**

* Design and develop scalable back\\-end services and APIs using both C\\# and .NET 8
* Implement extraction and transformation logic within .NET environments.
* Utilize Python for data processing, automation, and specific application logic as needed.
* Work directly on the Market Data API, taking ownership around enhancements and liaising with business teams to understand new requirements.
* Build processes and automated workflows that support data transformation as well as tools for handling various data types.
* Create Standard Frameworks with which data from different vendors and sources can be onboarded easy, fast and in a more self\\-service fashion
* Become a member of a global multidisciplinary team of Data and DevOps Engineers delivering features and enhancements for our platform
* Work in a supportive collaborative environment focused on delivering value to our users.
* Be a real technical problem solver, be able to work independently on solutions and the platform with a can\\-on attitude.
* Keep up to date with new trends in Data Analytics always looking to new solutions to solve complex problems.
* Work closely with the respective IT functions, particularly within the Data space (Market Data IT, Embedded IT etc).
* Take ownership of the technical design of new use cases and ETL jobs taking into consideration robustness, performance availability and maintainability of our strategic data platform.

**Your powerful skills**

* Experience in ETL environment to design, implement and maintain optimal data pipeline infrastructure including parsing, cleansing and wrangling of diverse and large datasets
* CI/CD Pipelines: Practical experience with CI/CD pipelines, using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitLab, or similar platforms.
* API Knowledge: Understanding of API creation and processes.
* Data Onboarding: Experience working with energy data providers to onboard data to internal platforms and APIs.
* AWS Proficiency: Hands\\-on experience with Amazon Web Services, including S3, Lambda, and EC2\\.
* Data storage solutions using relational databases such as MS SQL.
* The ability to translate business requirements into a technical design. Review and further improve existing technical designs.
* Understanding of operational aspects like high availability, monitoring, security, robustness.
* Knowledge in DevOps best practices
* Fluent in English: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

What we value most is **passion** , willingness to learn and a determined and resilient work ethic. So, if you can’t display all of the skills above then we would still love to hear from you!


**Benefits you can rely on**

* Working in one of the most interesting business contexts; a mixture of energy supply, trading and of course IT!
* Working in an large agile team on things which matter
* Evolve your skills together with us – we offer comprehensive on the job learning as well as support from internal experts to develop your existing skills even further
* Competitive salary plus annual discretionary bonus
Open and diverse company culture  
* 

**rwe.com/career**

Apply now with just a few clicks: ad code **90005,**

Any questions? Vince Manning (Recruiting), \\+44 7585 981083 ,


We look forward to meeting you!


We value diversity and therefore welcome all applications, irrespective of gender, disability, nationality, ethnic and social background, religion and beliefs, age or sexual orientation and identity. \\#inclusionmatters


Of course, you can find us on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and Xing, too.


RWE represents change, innovation and sustainability. As one of the world’s leading generators of electricity from renewable energy sources, we aim to be carbon\\-neutral by 2040 and to enable a sustainable life for people around the world. To achieve this, we are looking for dynamic and motivated people to join us in creating a sustainable and secure energy future.  



  

**About RWE Supply \\& Trading GmbH**

RWE Supply \\& Trading is the interface between RWE and the energy markets around the world. Around 2,000 employees from over 70 different countries trade electricity, gas, commodities and CO2 emission allowances. The trading entity also ensures the commercial optimisation of RWE’s power plant dispatch and markets electricity from RWE.


**More insights**

**From here, you can turn passion into valuable impact.**

Dive into our world of trading and find out which impact you can make with us.

Welcome to Arbio – where AI meets hospitality, and every day is a step toward redefining short\\-term rentals across Europe.


Arbio is a fast\\-growing, AI\\-enabled hospitality company. We are redefining the short\\-term rental industry through technology\\-driven efficiency, exceptional guest experience, and scalable operations. As a team, we're shaping the future of hospitality with cutting\\-edge AI solutions, expanding rapidly across Europe, and building on a culture of performance and accountability. Join us as we lead the industry and create opportunities for growth, innovation, and success.  

  

As a **Fullstack Software Engineer**, you’ll be working alongside talented developers, product managers, and designers to develop and maintain both front\\-end and back\\-end components of our product suite. You will contribute across all of our technical stack — from frontend, to backend, to data and infrastructure — and help us launch new products throughout Europe.  

  

**You will have an impact on:**

* **Code:** Good understanding of product requirements and ability to translate those into code to power new features.
* **Collaborate:** Work closely with Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, and stakeholders to deliver exceptional customer value.
* **Work with Cutting\\-Edge Tech:** Develop in a data\\-intensive, distributed environment using Nodejs, TypeScript, React and AWS services.
* **Innovate:** Design and build new functionality while improving existing systems.
* **Lead by example** by writing clean, testable code and supporting engineering best practices.
* **Decision\\-Making:** Actively contribute to team decisions regarding goals, timelines, and technology stack.
* **Improve performance, reliability, and scalability** to ensure our platform meets enterprise\\-grade standards.

 **What you will add to our Crew:**

* 3\\+ years of professional experience as a Fullstack or Software Engineer
* Solid knowledge of **TypeScript**, **React / Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **MySQL**
* Hands\\-on experience building scalable, distributed systems in a production environment
* Familiarity with **AWS** services and cloud\\-native development
* Strong understanding of clean code, testing, modular design, and maintainability
* A proactive mindset — you thrive in fast\\-moving, startup\\-style environments
* Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)
* **Bonus:** Experience with **React Native / Expo** is a big plus

 **Our current benefits**

* **Work Environment \\& Support:** Flexible working hours with a flexible work set\\-up combining office \\& remote work
* **Food \\& Beverage:** Free drinks, fruit and veggie baskets, beer, and pizza after All Hands
* **Sport:** Subsidized Qualitrain Subscription (includes: unlimited Beat81 classes, Holmes Place, Yoga studios, Boulder Halls, etc.
* **Mental Well\\-being:** Access to our mental health platform offering regular 1o1 sessions with coaches, trainers and psychologists
* **Travelling:** Free yearly stay in one of our apartments of your choice
* **Tech:** Possibility to choose between Windows, Lenovo, or MacBook
* **Culture:** Yearly Company Offsites, regular team events, Christmas party, summer party, budget for your birthday

 **What joining the Arbio Squad means for you**  

You will be part of a dynamic team of top\\-tier professionals from every domain, all united by a relentless drive. We are dedicated to nurturing and pushing each of our team members to unleash the best version of their professional selves. We believe in a culture of trusted ownership, caring meritocracy, and constructive feedback where we elevate each other while constantly challenging the status quo. Join a dynamic, young company with an entrepreneurial culture operating at lightning speed — with eyes set on global horizons!

Do you want to work on complex and pressing challenges—the kind that bring together curious, ambitious, and determined leaders who strive to become better every day? **If this sounds like you, you’ve come to the right place.**
**Your Impact**
---------------


You will play an active role in advising our clients, especially in the field of embedded software topics within advanced industries. This will include identifying issues, forming hypotheses, designing and conducting analyses, developing recommendations and discussing those with senior members of our clients’ leadership teams.
In this role, you will have the chance to be an entrepreneur, opening\\-up new opportunities for client impact and reinventing McKinsey’s approaches.
You will be responsible for identifying new client opportunities to advise companies on transformational change and capability building.
You will advise developing consultants and be an important source of intellectual insight in the field of embedded software on client projects, framing business problems in a way that the teams can then execute to drive impact and value.
Advising and collaborating with individual project managers, you will be part of the day\\-to\\-day problem solving and will bring expertise directly to senior clients and team members alike.
You will also work in cooperation with our worldwide network of consultants to shape McKinsey’s thinking in this area, continuously developing your own knowledge as well as that of the firm.
**Your Growth**
---------------


You will be based in one of our European offices as part of our Operations Practice and McKinsey Digital focusing on advanced industries.
We assist our clients in solving complex operational challenges. Blending strategic thinking with hands\\-on practicality, our teams of consultants and experts work to develop and implement operational and digital strategies that solve our clients’ most critical problems.
McKinsey’s Product Development service line is committed to helping clients develop products that fit market needs, produce attractive margins, provide platforms for add\\-on offerings, and enhance the reputation of brands for future business growth.
Together with McKinsey Digital, we harness the power of data and artificial intelligence, modernize their IT infrastructure, optimize and automate operations, drive digital growth, and build digital talent in an integrative, coordinated, and scalable way.
Learn more about our Operations Practice and McKinsey Digital here:
https://www.mckinsey.com/business\\-functions/operations/how\\-we\\-help\\-clients
https://www.mckinsey.com/business\\-functions/mckinsey\\-digital/how\\-we\\-help\\-clients
**Your qualifications and skills**
----------------------------------


* Academic degree in computer science (or similar, eg., electrical engineering)
* 10\\+ years of experience in software development in advanced industries (automotive, electrical/electronics, machinery, aerospace)—directly or in a supplier role
* Ideally, operational experience in software developer, hands\\-on architect, and project/program manager roles, with responsibility for large product/customer project scope
* Overall deep working knowledge of state\\-of\\-the\\-art software engineering as defined by top tech players (eg, Google, Microsoft, AWS)
* Hands\\-on expertise in software architecture and systems architecture for embedded software and back end, ie, ability to read, modify, and design complex architectures, with working knowledge of relevant architecture tools (eg, Enterprise Architect, PreeVision)
* Familiar with cloud platforms, IT security principles and techniques, and understanding of data engineering, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, experience in application to one domain
* Working knowledge of programming languages and coding techniques
* Deep working knowledge of state\\-of\\-the\\-art software processes and tools, including process standards and norms: process maturity standards (eg, CMMi, A\\-SPICE), safety norms for at least one industry (eg, ISO26262\\), security standards and norms (eg, UNECE WP 29\\)
* Experience in managing large\\-scale software/systems development projects (as responsible project/program lead), including large\\-scale problem resolution and budget responsibility as well as reporting/stakeholder management
* Excellent critical thinking and problem\\-solving skills
* Proven ability to influence others; ability to effectively collaborate and work in teams
* Spoken and written ability to communicate complex ideas effectively, in English and the local language
